item.description:
I am not going to be able to make this event. Fortunately Chandra and Angela will take over organizer duties for me this day. Have a great, dress warm and have fun! Keep an eye out for possible changes in the time. :)

Free event at the Weston Ski Track giving trails of snowshoes for FREE!! What a great way to try out a new sport! :) This event can get crowded. Please click on their link for more details.
Last time I went I needed to have my drivers license.

This event starts at 9:30 am at the Weston Ski Track, 200 Park Rd, Weston MA 781 891 6575.

Cost: Annual Members FREE- members and guests $2 each.

We will meet at the Braintree Town Hall at 8:30am with a firm departure time of 8:45am if you would like to carpool. Please let me know if you are going to carpool or meet us in Weston at 9:30am. Again, the area is crowded with other meetup groups attending as well as other groups (last time I went it was with a Big Sister Sponsored event).


http://www.skiboston....

Winter Trails Day is a national event each January focusing on introducing people to the great fun of getting outside in the winter on cross-country skis or snowshoes. The event will run from 9am-2pm.

Snowshoeing
For 2010, all snowshoe events will be free and do not require pre-registration. Everyone will receive a free snowshoeing trail pass, there will be free snowshoe demos, and we will be leading a number of free guided tours. There will be a limited number of demo snowshoes available; those who want to use snowshoes for more than 15-20 minutes can rent them from us at the regular rate
XC Skiing
Free ski lessons will be available with pre-registration and the purchase of a trail pass (and rental if needed); see our regular rates. Free ski lessons are only available with pre-registration and payment. To register or view a class schedule, select the appropriate lesson (on their website link listed above. Please click that for more details)
item.how_to_find_us: Carpool lot - Angela drives a Blue Toyota RAV4. Near the Front door@ the event. Chandra will have a green backpack, Angela will be in a bright blue or pink jacket.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Trails Day 2010
